quote: Marriage is our society's most pro-child institution.
author: David Blankenhorn

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship than a good marriage.
author: Martin Luther

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: The obstacle on the path becomes the path.
author: Seneca

quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.
author: Seneca

quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Man conquers the world by conquering himself.
author: Zeno of Citium

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
author: Roy Croft

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon
